ICDThematicWord: Malignant neoplasm of other endocrine glands and related structures.Pituitary gland
definitionCn: 一种极为罕见的WHO I级限制性生长缓慢肿瘤,由神经垂体或漏斗部产生,并在成人中描述。 其特征在于存在细长的纺锤形的新生胶质细胞,其形成了斑状图案或交织束状排列。 体征和症状包括视力障碍,头痛,闭经和性欲减退。
definitionEn: An extremely rare, WHO grade I, circumscribed and slow-growing tumor that arises from the neurohypophysis or infundibulum and described in adults. It is characterized by the presence of elongated, spindle-shaped neoplastic glial cells that form storiform patterns or interlacing fascicular arrangements. Signs and symptoms include visual disturbances, headache, amenorrhea, and decreased libido.
DifferentialDiagnosis:
granular cell tumours of the pituitary region
pilocytic astrocytoma of the neurohypophysis
craniopharyngioma
When larger, then it is difficult to anticipate the diagNOSis with other diagNOSes being far more common, including: 
pituitary macroadenoma
meningioma
pituitary metastasis
pituitary infiltration
lymphocytic hypophysitis
neurosarcoidosis
optic pathway glioma
CTImageDescription: Typically pituicytomas are homogeneously enhancing, either with the pituitary fossa or in the suprasellar region. Size is variable, ranging from a few millimetres to a few centimetres.
MRIImageDescription:
T1: isointense solid mass; posterior pituitary bright spot often absent
T1 C+ (Gd): bright contrast enhancement
T2: heterogeneous, hypointense to isointense
CTImageDescriptionInCN: CT平扫为高密度, 增强扫描为明显均匀强化
DifferentialDiagnosisInCN:
在Workup中讨论病理性鉴别诊断。 临床鉴别诊断根据颗粒细胞瘤的部位而不同,如下所示：
粘膜下层颗粒细胞瘤（如舌,喉,外阴）上覆鳞状上皮假性上皮瘤样增生可能被误诊为鳞状细胞癌。 也报道了共存的颗粒细胞肿瘤和鳞状细胞肿瘤以及头颈部鳞状细胞癌。 乳房的颗粒细胞肿瘤可能在临床上,严重地和显微镜下模拟乳房的癌。
MRIImageDescriptionInCN:
实性 的、稀疏 的、 相对增强团块。位于鞍上、蝶鞍, 亦可位于二 区, 有的有钙化。
T1加 权像呈低信号, 示均匀或不均匀信号,T2示相对增强信号.

pituitaryGland.name: 胚胎性肿瘤伴多层菊形团,C19MC变异
淋巴细胞丰富型脑膜瘤
炎症性肌纤维母细胞瘤
乳头状胶质神经元肿瘤
多形性黄色星形细胞瘤

c100: Axial FLAIR.MRI of the brain and pituitary demonstrates a sizeable mass centered in the suprasellar and interpeduncular sellar, continuous with the infundibulum of the pituitary gland. It is isointense on T1 and iso- to perhaps slightly hyperintense on T2 weighted images. It enhances vividly. Normal pituitary tissue is seen in the bass of the fossa.
轴向天赋。脑和脑垂体的MRI表现为以上节段和花梗为中心的相当大的肿块，与脑下垂体的漏斗相连。它在T1和iso上是等强度的，在T2加权像上可能有点高强度。它能增强生动。正常垂体组织可见于窝的低音部。
